sectionText: Topic: Intro to Printmaking.  Meets in room 22 Noble Hall.  This course offers an introduction to printmaking materials and techniques, including intaglio, relief, monotype, and screenprint.  Over the course of several projects that cumulatively build skills, students will gain familiarity with printmaking facilities and equipment as well as the historical arc of print media.  Composition and technique will be emphasized, and projects that relate to work developed in other studio and design areas will be encouraged.
sectionNotes: Restricted to Graphic Design or Crafts or History of Art or Photography or Industrial Design or Painting or Sculpture or Art Education or Art and Design or Art Foundation or New Media major(s) or minor(s).
